Package managers

Class AppointmentManager

java.lang.Object
managers.AppointmentManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Manager
public class AppointmentManager extends Object implements Manager
A Manager object meant to handle any appointment scheduling
Since:
2024-11-21

    addAppointment(AppointmentSlot slot)
    Adds an AppointmentSlot to List Of AppointmentManager Writes to appointments.csv, increments nextAppointmentID in AppointmentManager Used by makeDailyAppointments

    getAppointmentsByDoctor(String doctorID)
    Returns a List of AppointmentSlots Depending if DoctorID of AppointmentSlot matches

    Returns a List of AppointmentSlots Depending if PatientID of AppointmentSlot matches
    static List<AppointmentSlot>
    getAvailableAppointments()
    Returns a List of AppointmentSlots Depending if AppointmentStatus of AppointmentSlot is AVAILABLE
    void
    initialise()
    Loads in data from appointments.csv Creates appointments.csv if it doesn't exist or populates it with appointment slots if its empty
    static void
    makeDailyAppointments(List<Doctor> doctors)
    Generates AppointmentSlots for Doctors if appointments.csv is not populated Generates hourly slots for each Doctor in the list.
    static void
    removeAppointments(Doctor d)
    Removes AppointmentSlots if a Doctor is removed If AppointmentSlot is AVAILABLE, it is removed from the list of AppointmentSlots in AppointmentManager If AppointmentSlot is PENDING, it is marked as CANCELLED appointments.csv is updated
    static void
    viewAllAppointments()
    Prints all AppointmentSlots in appointmentSlotArray of AppointmentManager

  • Field Details

    • appointmentSlotArray

      public static List<AppointmentSlot> appointmentSlotArray
      List of Appointment Slots

    • numberOfSlots

      public static int numberOfSlots
      Number of Slots to be created per doctor

      public static int nextAppointmentID
      ID of next appointment to be created

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentManager

      public AppointmentManager()

  • Method Details

    • makeDailyAppointments

      public static void makeDailyAppointments(List<Doctor> doctors)
      Generates AppointmentSlots for Doctors if appointments.csv is not populated Generates hourly slots for each Doctor in the list. The number of slots depends on the value of the attribute numberOfSlots in AppointmentManager
      Parameters:
      doctors - List of Doctors initialised from Staff.csv

    • removeAppointments

      public static void removeAppointments(Doctor d)
      Removes AppointmentSlots if a Doctor is removed If AppointmentSlot is AVAILABLE, it is removed from the list of AppointmentSlots in AppointmentManager If AppointmentSlot is PENDING, it is marked as CANCELLED appointments.csv is updated
      Parameters:
      d - Doctor to be removed

    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(AppointmentSlot slot)
      Adds an AppointmentSlot to List Of AppointmentManager Writes to appointments.csv, increments nextAppointmentID in AppointmentManager Used by makeDailyAppointments
      Parameters:
      slot - AppointmentSlot to be added

    • getAppointmentsByPatient

      public static List<AppointmentSlot> getAppointmentsByPatient(String patientID)
      Returns a List of AppointmentSlots Depending if PatientID of AppointmentSlot matches
      Parameters:
      patientID - PatientID to check AppointmentSlot against
      Returns:
      List of AppointmentSlots that match PatientID

    • getAppointmentsByDoctor

      public static List<AppointmentSlot> getAppointmentsByDoctor(String doctorID)
      Returns a List of AppointmentSlots Depending if DoctorID of AppointmentSlot matches
      Parameters:
      doctorID - DoctorID to check AppointmentSlot against
      Returns:
      List of AppointmentSlots that match DoctorID

    • getAvailableAppointments

      public static List<AppointmentSlot> getAvailableAppointments()
      Returns a List of AppointmentSlots Depending if AppointmentStatus of AppointmentSlot is AVAILABLE
      Parameters:
      void -
      Returns:
      List of AppointmentSlots that have AppointmentStatus as AVAILABLE

    • viewAllAppointments

      public static void viewAllAppointments()
      Prints all AppointmentSlots in appointmentSlotArray of AppointmentManager
      Parameters:
      void -

    • initialise

      public void initialise()
      Loads in data from appointments.csv Creates appointments.csv if it doesn't exist or populates it with appointment slots if its empty
      Specified by:
      initialise in interface Manager
      Parameters:
      void -
